place_description: Sunflour Baking Company is a local bakery with locations in Harrisburg and Charlotte. Founded in 2009, Harrisburg is the newest location to feature fresh made pastries, local brewed coffee, and a great place to meet or hang out. Come visit Sunflour Baking Company today.

reviews_data.review_text: First off, I love this place. I have no clue what everyone else is talking about because I have only ever had an amazing experience with the service. HOWEVER, the music... awful. Why on earth while I'm eating the best sandwich I've ever had, do I have to listen to a cover of the jungle book soundtrack. Every other coffee shop I go to has a NORMAL playlist going with cute aesthetic songs that fit the coffee shops vibes, not this one. I guarantee that if you let any of the young employees behind the counter have control of the music then I wouldn't have to listen to the Muppets theme song while drinking my matcha (which is delicious btw). Don't even get me started on their Christmas time playlist... it's hard rock and heavy metal covers of classic Christmas songs (so it sounds like grandma is getting ran over by a reindeer in the middle of a mosh pit).  DO BETTER! (with love, its not hard to go on spotify and find a random coffee shop playlist that does not include a random French woman wailing like Yoko Ono).
Excelente lugar y muy buena atencion, las chicas son muy amables.
The food was great. It was exciting to see so many gluten-free options!

My fiancee & I had a great wedding vegan cake testing experience with Lola!

She was very patience, friendly with great customer service.

They accommodate customers with dietary restrictions. Lots of flavors to pick from!

I highly recommend

Sunflour Baking Company is my favorite bakery in Charlotte!! The desserts are delicious and fresh everyday! I really enjoy their breakfast and lunch foods as well. The bacon, egg and cheddar on the cheddar biscuit is simply amazing! The biscuit is HUGE and is definitely worth the price. I also really love to order an iced tangerine ginger tea with a zucchini brownie! You will not be disappointed if you order anything from their menu!
Would you like some coffee with your water? Come on down and sip to some royalty free funk music! What the hell is this place.
Expensive, mediocre taste, had to wait 20 minutes for two sandwiches. Bland and not so fresh tiramisu. Has great potential but idk
il caffe e meraviglioso, i dolci sono ottimi, non posso lamentarmi e per un italiano e davvero molto buono.
Staff friendly, food fresh n coffee nice and hot.  Great spot to stop and meet up with a friend or two
We ordered a gender reveal cake and are so happy with how it turned out! I worked with Karmen to order it and she was responsive and helpful. Thank you so much!

Slow slow slow. Every time I come here it's a solid 15 minutes to even get to the order counter even with only 2 people ahead of me in line. I don't know how people have time to wait up to an hour for food from here.

Yes it's delicious but holy cow the wait is only reasonable for people who have absolutely nothing else going on. Remarks on customer service lacking is spot on. Ladies behind the counter not on register stare at you while very slowly working.

The good: drinks and bites were good! The bad: Service and food times were horrible. Food was never delivered to our table. They didn't realize they didn't have a flavor of latte until they made the latte? So just left it on the back counter and made no attempt to explain or give alternative options. Long line, slow cashier. Conclusion: avoid if you're in a rush but worth the wait if you have the time to spend in a lovely little coffee shop

The food is great and so is the coffee. The service is friendly and personal. They have yummy breakfast burritos and sandwiches for breakfast or lunch as well as soup. Their pastries are works of art that will make your taste buds grin. They even have some of their recipes bagged up as mixes you can take home and prepare.

Cute and charming restaurant, but I'll NEVER come back. The young girl taking our order was clearly frustrated that my group of 8 walked in. I had to ask many questions about GF alternative options before she finally said, "I mean, we could put the sandwich toppings in a bowl".
They had blocked most of the dining area's seating with a theater retractable rope. When I asked to free up four seats so that we could sit (because all other seating was taken), she said no because they had already cleaned that area. It was 1pm. They close at 4pm. I pushed the rope back 3 feet to open just enough seating for us. She sighed loudly! Then, she brought us the wrong food... in a bag because they didn't have any plates left. What?
She didn't belive me when I told her it was the wrong food, so I had to reopen my kids wrapped sandwiches and open the bread to show her.
A family of five came in after us and they simply retracted the rope and sat. When one employee told them they couldn't sit there and she failed to get them to move, ANOTHER employee tried to kick them out of their seats! She also failed and was told she would simply need to clean the small area again. The rope was put back in place by the employee and retracted by the family about 5 times.
The service was a nightmare. Even though the food was okay, I'll never come back.

My husband and I was standing there waiting for at least 10 minutes before our order was taken. The young lady working walked by us a few times and didn't say anything. Another employee was working on an order and never said a word. No  I'll be with you soon or apology for the wait. After we ordered, I expressed my concern about the lack of customer service. Still no acknowledgement or apology.
Very nice setting inside. Great display of pastries. Daughters family are gluten free so for a birthday celebration I bought cupcakes; chocolate & birthday cake - they loved them!
Great food.
Lovely place, good service, excellent products. Breakfast sandwiches are terrific!

Went to Sunflour baking company for Sunday brunch and had a mixed experience. The service was poor. I had the tomato soup, and it was just average. On the bright side, the atmosphere was good, and there was plenty of seating available. Overall, it was an okay visit, but there's definitely room for improvement.

Terrible service. Every time I come here I end up waiting over a half hour for my food because of some issue with the servers forgetting to call it out or not making part of the ider until the very end. Food is delicious though.
Cutesy little stop for breakfast/lunch. Lovely staff and quick service.
Regardless of what location you choose expect a 20-30 minute wait for your food.

Every time I go there I'm ignored waiting for my calling in order. I mean they look at me, make eye contact and says nothing. But they address people who don't look like me differently. This is the 3rd time this has happened. Treat people fair!

My husband and I went to this location because it's closer to our home looking forward to the key lime pie. Unfortunately they were out of that and many other items we would have enjoyed. Still ordered a cupcake and a cinnamon bun and was totally underwhelmed! Too sweet and not as good. The building is apparently old and drop ceilings had stains. We left and the sweets went in the trash! I've been to the 7th street location multiple times and always happy with the desserts and baked goods. Also went to the NODA location recently and was impressed. Harrisburg location would not be on my list of places to go.

My brother brought me here for breakfast and it was the best. I will be returning. The service, the food and the atmosphere was Amazing.....the music playing was perfect for the atmosphere. I just adore this little place in a big way. No complaints or negative feedback whatsoever.......I just Love and Adore this place. #1

I have been here several times. I kept coming back despite abysmal service and long waits each time because the pastries are good, there are vegan options, and I want to support local business. We stopped ordering sandwiches a long time ago because it actually takes 45 minutes for an order to be filled. Unfortunately after my last visit I will not be returning. My husband and I went and waited 20 minutes after ordering pastries from the display. The staff filled orders from behind us before even starting ours. My husband provided feedback to the manager on their website and wrote a Google review as well (nothing rude, you can see it below). Upon reading the feedback from their website, the manager offered him a coupon and apologies, however once the manager saw his review on Google, he wrote back rescinding his apology and coupon and stated his staff was right. Shame on the management. This place could be a real asset to the community, but I will be taking my business elsewhere.

Went and ordered just pastries. Gave good tip (over $5 to just place pastries in a bag) hoping to get prompt service. The people behind the counter rather than starting our order, which was just putting pastries into a bag, proceeded to fill/start several orders of people waiting behind us before ours. This isn't the first time we've had subpar service behind the counter. Food is good but maybe not worth the aggravation. 20 minutes to put pastries into a bag??? Really???

I had the misfortune of visiting Sunflower Baking Company not once, but twice within the past 4 days, and both times were equally disappointing. It's baffling how this place remains in business with such atrocious customer service.

On my first visit, I was completely ignored by the staff. I stood at the counter, clearly visible, while the employees were engrossed in their own chat, completely oblivious to my presence. After waiting far too long, I eventually left, feeling completely unacknowledged.

Determined to give them another chance, I returned for a second visit. This time, it was just as bad. The same two employees were once again engaged in their own conversation, and it took me speaking up before they even noticed I was there. When they finally did, their lack of professionalism was even more evident.

I inquired about some pastries marked as 50% off in the case, only to be told by one of the staff members that they shouldn't even be on display. Without hesitation, she removed them from the case, tossed them in the trash, and walked away without offering any further assistance or even a basic apology.

It's incredible how Sunflower has managed to cultivate such a dismal customer service experience. Harrisburg is  a small community and I am an advocate  of supporting the local business in my backyard. Unfortunately, they will need to over haul their entire staff before I consider returning.  Save yourself the frustration and take your business elsewhere.

Don't share sensitive info. Chats may be reviewed and used to train our models. Learn
Best fresh  EVERYTHING!!
Nice place to meet, relax and enjoy a nice snack

this bakery is a must try! croissants are very delicious.  their breakfast sandwiches are the best in Charlotte!  seriously. Girls working at the front were sweet and the place looks neat with cute sitting area inside and outside.
TERRIBLE SERVICE! My order My order took more than 30 minutes to be delivered to my table .
We loved the gluten free options here! The peach muffins were great!

Love this spot. However the last time I went. 7/21 it was the most bland uninspired food I've had. The cheddar biscuit is usually amazing I didn't get a hint of cheese off of it and it had no seasoning on the eggs, bacon was just fine. I'm gonna say this was an off hand experience and I'll return again for that biscuit.

This place was bad, which is such a shame because I dont think my experience accurately represents this establishment as a whole. Lots of young women working there who did not seem to care about the place one way or another. Waited for about 10 minutes while a worker just sat at the register doing nothing before she decided to notice and take our order, and had an attitude the entire time. I ordered a Sunny Special, and instead of putting sundried tomato pesto on my sandwich, they just put a slice of tomato. There id also arugala that is supposed to be on my sandwich and they put about 2 pieces of lettuce. My sausage was cold as well. Just overall a terrible experience. Staff needs to step it up because small businesses are important and they are ruining it for the owners and customers alike.

So glad we found this spot!
Nice place to enjoy a coffee or breakfast with delicious cookies and baking goods.
Went only to be told they aren't serving food. Please update hours online to reflect that the kitchen closes early.

The espresso is very good!! I got an americano just black and added 1 cream and 1 stevia  baked goods are made fresh daily. I haven't tried the food, but I plan to! Also, customer service was great :)
Serving frozen muffins for $5 - Disappointed!!
Probably the best privately owned bakery ive ever been to. Their key lime deserts are to die for!!!
Food and coffee were great. There are plenty of seats you can either work or just meet with friends.
It was very busy but my coffee and pastry was great. Excellent customer service

We ordered a vegan cake for our daughter's birthday and it exceeded our expectations.
It was pretty and delicious. I almost prefer it to regular cake!  I would definitely recommend trying vegan cake from Sunflour.

I never have an issue with staff, but this team is so incredibly rude. I received a broken macaroon half the size of the others, and when I asked for a replacement, I was told only if a paid for an additional macaroon. I'm not sure how this staff gets away with being so rude so consistently, but it seems like it's related to management. I remember a few years ago when this wasn't the case, and I wish they'd get back to that.

So I haven't been here in 2 years because we moved but was in the area and stopped in this morning for a late Breakfast. Ended up ordering from the app that is advertised on their front door since there was a long line. It all went down hill from there! The man working the cash register is a complete piece of work. I asked him where I should go to pick up my food, and he basically yelled at me for using he app and said he doesn't know it's a whole different system. I asked well is there like a shelf where you put to go orders when they're ready and he points at something behind his counter so indeed I do need to ask him for my food when it is ready. Im not sure why he had such an attitude. I also watched another cashier take a table the wrong type of muffin, then take it back and bring the right flavor and the look on her face. Well, I guess no one likes working here or serving customers. Ahh well won't be back. P.s. $10 for a breakfast sandwich served with a terrible attitude too much. My dad ended up waiting inside for the food and I went to the car with my son but he was also rude and mean to my dad.

food and drink were good, however had an issue with the service. my sister and i both ordered large drinks, but when we received them hers was medium. not a problem, i understand mistakes happen, but when i told the employee it was supposed to be large he said "well you weren't charged for a large but ok" (i checked the receipt, we were charged for a large, he just didn't see it i guess). a little rude, but again, not complaining, some people just have bad days. he came back not even a minute later with the "large" which was very clearly the same drink but with added ice to make it look like more. my sister asked about this, even said she didn't mind the smaller size but just to please refund the price difference. he refused to admit it. he did offer to remake it but we just wanted to leave and not deal with all that. i mean come on  (pic included, hers is the chai and mine is the matcha. very clearly like double the amount of ice in hers)

The one at the desk who helped me seems so lazy and they forgot to send it to kitchen. After 20 mins of wait they realised the order is not sent to kitchen. When asked they offered me if I want a refund if not they could make in 5 mins, which again took another 15 mins to get just 2 sandwiches. FYI, it is not too busy for them to miss out the order to send it to kitchen. It's pure negligence.
Great coffee, and the muffins. The Best
Expensive and not much selection. Not what I was expecting.
My new favorite bakery
They have phenomenal food and the atmosphere is outstanding but some of the staff need help with proper service.
Delicious breakfast and pastries, love that they serve Pure Intentions coffee (my favorite local roaster). The barista working the front was busy and still provided great service, thank you!

I've ordered from this particular location for YEARS. The last year it has dramatically dropped in quality. I just got this delivered- and the sandwich is burnt to a crisp, and has little to nothing for filler. For a $12 sandwich, this is insulting and disgusting that they felt comfortable to send this out of the door.... Shame on yall. This was definitely my last time going to this location. They used to be the best but severely has dropped the ball.. I want to stress my review is for THIS location alone- not Sunflour as a whole. They're one of my favorite restaurants.
Cute cafe type place. I ordered the breakfast burrito which was good. The iced caramel latte was ok as well.
Great customer service
I've been there a few times the croissants are good and the vanilla pastry extremely good. I just wish for a smaller size
Good breakfast sandwiches and great sandwiches for lunch. Their baked goods are always fresh and tasty, too. Adequate seating indoors.

I ordered gluten, dairy, soy free cake and my order was ready the next day. It looks quite simple,  but nice. The cream for the cake was disgusting. Out of all the  guests on my son birthday only one wanted to eat it after trying a bite.
Strongly recommend to try a peace before you ll buy all cake. It's not cheap.

Sunny's Special Sandwich (Rosemary sourdough bread) with meat, egg and sundried tomato pesto was decent. Blueberry muffin was aromatic and surprisingly the sweetness comes from only blueberries. Pastry is crumbly and fresh.

Purchase 3 muffins today were not fresh. 2 morning glory and 1chip moca. Both were hard and cold to the touch. Called to let them know and experience terrible customer service  from an employee who claimed  to be a manager. Had to take them back for a refund
Simple visit. Had the Chicken Salad on Rosemary bread. It was quite tasty. The Cinnamon Roll was good. I have had better. I would go here again.

While the food is still good service has gone done especially with Uber eats. I was charged 37 dollars for an order cancelled in less then "50 seconds" via the Uber rep. But because I didn't see the charge until the 30th on my bank account still came out of my account.  Had a HORRIBLE personal experience getting food them. The woman who did not greet me and act like I was a piece of trash treated her staff with the same contempt.  Honestly felt bad for the staff
Great place pleasant as well

I didn't get a chance to take a picture of the sandwich before I devoured it, but I got the TAB on sourdough and added lettuce as well as an iced chai with pistachio milk. Both were delicious, and I get them every time I go. The staff is always very nice and I always love love love the atmosphere. It's definitely the best little cafe/bakery I've been to.
Best Cold Brew I've ever had! Everything is large portions.  My favorite!
Great place! Fresh food!
Best place for vegan and gluten free treats . The gingerbread muffin is amazing

Very disappointed. You order at counter , asked for tip 15% and up. Waited at table 20 minutes and got lukewarm macchiatos. Another 5 for our cold egg sandwiches. Never asked how food was and you clean up yourself. Won't be back.

I've been here many times & usually get their muffins. Which are always delicious & moist, but today me & my 9 yr old daughter came in this morning before her appointment since we had an hour to kill, she got the hot chocolate with lots of marshmallows on the top. My daughter took a sip of the hot chocolate after several mins off the top where the marshmallows were and temperature on the top was fine, so when I walked to get napkins and couple spoons and complimentary water my 9 yr old daughter asummed the rest of temp of hott chocolate would be fine & she took a big sip she said from the straw and she got at that point the bottom/middle of the hot chocolate where it was the hottest at and it was so hot she burnt the whole tip of her tongue and within 30-40mins max if that here we sit at fast med urgent care bc she can't even talk or put her tongue in her mouth bc of the pain from the tons of small red pin point blisters all over the tip of her tongue from the hott chocolate burning her tongue pretty severely.... The worker that I placed an order with knew the hot chocolate was not for me but for a child idk nobody would warn me or my 9 yr old when bringing it to our table bc we sat inside and ate to be careful bc it's very hott.

Today we made a special trip to the Sunflower Baking Co. and it was amazing as always, they have fresh baked goods and Hot sandwiches herethat make is special every time. Today there was kind of a rush on things at the counter and our order took a little extra time to come out, that's OK for us we were in no rush and enjoying conversation, the staff felt bad we had waited so long we got a complimentary treat. It was not needed yet itwas a sweet gesture, so one of the kids will have a sweet treat today. Thank You Sunglower for always making a great impression, and for the Military discount. Totally coming back!!!
Waited for my food for about 30 minutes. The people that came in with me and after me all had their food and left. The drink was okay, tho. There's definitely room for improvement.

I wanted to take a moment to recognize Josie! My family and I frequent your establishment quite often and last week Saturday my kiddos and I stopped by to grab some sweets before we went to Grandmas house.  I purchased 5 items including a tropical coconut tea, which is my absolute favorite!  Josie informed me after I ordered that the tropical coconut tea was out of stock.  :( of course I was super bummed but Josie made the experience that much better by pivoting and offering me a different beverage of my choice.  She was apologetic, polite, and soft spoken.  Great customer service should never be overlooked and I just wanted to make sure that Josie was recognized for going above and beyond.  Thanks Josie you are a rockstar!! :)

Came with my mom we used to go here a lot. I waited for my food and coffee. The avacado toast was good but my coffee came out last and had to get the free water so I could have something to drink with my meal. Definitely a place to order via phone so they dont forget your order. I wouldnt go and hangout in the restaurant again thats why I usually get it to go via phone order.
Great service, great environment, great coffee, and great food. All around a good place to sit down drink coffee and get some work done.

I usually have a great experience when I come here. Today whoever was checking me out, didn't really seem interested in being there. Asked for extra mayo on my blt, I got none. Didn't even say anything to me after I got done paying. I recommend coming on a weekday to receive better service
Every time I've been there, the service has been wonderful and the food is great.

Meh.
They have a very good grilled cheese. They also have a decent roll. The coffee, croissants, and cookies are nothing to write home about. What irked me was their slooow inaccurate service. They seemed to forget about my order as I stood around a very empty store...so I had to ask about my order. The cashier also couldn't get quantities right. Two items requested turned into one item in my bag. At least she didn't charge me for 2. The place was decently clean so that's a plus.
OMG!!! The banana-chocolate chip muffin and anything on the rosemary bread!!! Yummy
Great, fresh food. Love the cheddar biscuits.
A small black coffee was not available without having to wait for them to brew and refill an entire pitcher. One should not have to wait 10 minutes for a small black coffee.
OMG, the food and coffee are amazing!
I'm 9 year old and I don't eat out much but when I do I have hard time finishing my food, this time I got number 1 and it was best I got so far
Food is always delicious! My personal favorite are the morning glory muffins.
Their jalapeno cheddar biscuit never disappoints. Had the egg cheese and avocado sandwich on the jalapeno cheddar biscuit. Haven't been disappointed here yet. Highly recommend.
8:30 on a Saturday morning and hardly any pastries. Only one girl behind the counter. It's not even rush yet. I had to get day old pastry. Very disappointed! They are not usually like this.
I love the place, great food, nice people!  We love Sunflour Bakery! Perfect location, too!
Great coffee, pastries and food. Especially the breakfast sandwiches!  The service is also very friendly. Highly recommended!  Great seating area.

Great for Breakfast and savouries options. I had here with my friend for the first time Multigrain Bread Spicy Humus sandwich and Hot Matcha Latte as well as Lemon Raspberry Pastry was delish. My friend took the Egg Sandwich and Cappuccino, she loved them. I recommend trying these if you plan on going there.

Visited here a number of times over the years, and this place has always kept up with their standards. It's nice and clean here, very friendly, the coffee and food are always awesome. Overall, it's a nice experience. Unfortunately, I forgot to take some pictures of the food for y'all this time. Please give this little place a shot!
Please please please please bring back Almond Milk. (pistachio is very different) I'm begging!

$5 plus for a cinnamon roll? At least this the prices!   I got the egg biscuit too and it tasted like pork.  It was not good   They make it seem like this place is a high quality or at least fresh, but it is not. Bojangles is as good and half the price.
This cafe is adorable and the food is delicious.  It's always a pleasure to visit.
The breakfast food is delicious. I wanted a chicken salad sandwich, but they were out of it. I will return for lunch soon.

I love the black Friday sandwich when it's spot on which hasn't happened very much in recent months. It is not made consistently every time I get it which is mostly Sundays at lunch time and we always get it to go.  The cranberry apple chutney is the star but sometimes there is barely any on it so you can't even taste it and the sandwich is very dry without a decent portion of it.  With this sandwich being $10 with tax please don't jip your customers on the ingredients.  Also it's supposed to come with a pickle spear on the side but they hardly ever include it even if we remind them when we place order they still leave it out. Again $10 sandwich, please give your customers the pickle that is supposed to be included per your menu.  Love this place and everything they make, just get disappointed and frustrated when it doesn't live up to the quality that I have had in the past.
Love their selection of baked goods. Lemon poppy seed muffins are delish. Cute place. Bit pricey but isn't everything these days...
We love this spot, a healthier alternative to all the fast food joints in Harrisburg! Great breakfast and lunch and a delicious bakery!
An excellent experience. Great sandwiches and pastries. Friendly and helpful service staff.
It is yume
Delicious sandwiches and beautiful, mouth-watering desserts. Unique blend of patrons, including hipsters, grandparents and grandchildren, and a knitting club. It was a pleasant lunch : )
It was my first time. It was bright and clean and everything  looked appetizing. The service was a pleasure to chat with when ordering.  The food and coffee were good.
Everything is super fresh. They make great breakfast and lunch sandwiches. Lots of really good specialty drinks too!
The very best breakfast sandwiches in the area and excellent customer service. This place has quickly become one our favorite spots!

I spent $18-19 on DoorDash?
A true and honest review:
2/5
The food was done in a fair amount of time and quite quick for DoorDash but the only issue I have is that sandwich being extremely dry & bland. There was no flavor really or anything good about the sandwiches. The egg was a no for me on my bacon egg and cheese. It's good for folks who are NON POC, cause they won't even tell a difference. But overall I wouldn't recommend their sandwiches. I also got a DoorDash order from them before with a latte and god the portion size is horrible. I would only go here for pastries.
Love this place! Everything I've gotten here has been wonderful!
Excellent food and service. We went there for their gluten free food.
Super awesome pastries.

Loved this place. Great coffee too
Today I got a miniature key lime cheesecake. Oh yeah

Food is delicious, but I recommend not using the online ordering. Sunflour received and prepared my order, however the delivery service did not arrive to pick it up although I had paid the hefty delivery fee. Beware of the delivery service!
Best local artisan breakfast shop. Great sandwiches and sweet treats.
This is a pretty good coffee shop. Their pastry assortment is wide. They make really good Iced Matcha Latte. The cinnamon roll was my favourite as well as the Key lime pie.

Great food, great coffee and a friendly crew. Bigger than it looks from the outside - plenty of seating inside. Can't go wrong with #2 on an English muffin, black Friday or breakfast burrito when it's on the menu... and the cookies are amazing. I reccomend giving them a try.

So this is my second time eating with them and delicious!! This morning I ordered the Berries Croissant and the Breakfast Burrito Sandwich (Tortilla) and again they didn't disappoint Very Tasty!! The Burrito is definitely Sharable size I would say the Croissant is too but it's to darn good with a cup coffee!! Definitely will order again!!
Always great food, & friendly staff!
One of my favorite breakfast places to go after dropping the kids off at school. The croissants are very close to the ones I had in Paris.

Nice coffee shop. I love their selection of pastries. They make a really good Iced Matcha Latte. The pastries were really good. I really liked the cinnamon roll (especially when you heat it up.) and the Blueberry Danish. The Key lime pie and Tiramisu were good too.
Baked goods are good but expensive. No real cream or half and half for coffee! Also served cold biscuit, was not asked if I wanted it warmed or to eat here or To Go.

I was VERY disappointed with my visit! I wish I could give it 0 stars. I was so excited to try Sunflower's gluten free options. I had done my research and was eager to eat there....until I walked in the door. There was no one else in the store but the woman behind the counter and she didn't even greet me or even turn around. Then when I greeted her she kept her back to me and mumbled hello begrudgingly. Wow. So, I asked her what gf items she had left and once again with her back towards me she briefly stated what they had without even pointing them out to me. Honestly, it felt very racially motivated. I don't say that often, but she CLEARLY had a problem with me even tho I just walked into the store. I just couldn't bring myself to purchase anything after being made to feel so UNWELCOMED! (I was there around 4:15pm on a Tuesday...and i will never return)
Food was great! The croissant was huge and so good! Recommend the bacon, egg and cheddar on the croissant and the blueberry muffin!

Food is decent here.  The coffee not so much.  Cappuccinos come in one size which apparently is micro?  The barista in her head covering could have told me that when I asked for a large cappuccino.   They then bring it out in a thimble and when I ask why it wasn't a large I'm told rather smuggly that cappuccinos only come in one size.  Other barista...very pleasant. 7-11 has better coffee.
Good food but fairly pricey for what you get.   Very much an unemployed hipster vibe when we visited.
Love swinging by when in the area.
I always get good service, good food and their gluten free selection is pretty extensive!

Bacon, egg, cheese on a cheddar biscuit!
5 star review is based on the quality of the food and service received. Keep it up Sunflour!!

The sandwich was $8.51 after tax so that hurt, BUT, that sandwich was delicious.

Not a place I would frequent everyday based on the price point but I certainly would bring my family for Saturday breakfast or Saturday lunch on occasion or treat out of town guests.

First visit was at South Charlotte location.   This Harrisburg location much closer.  Ended up purchasing the Day Old Muffins.  1/2 price.  They are excellent.   We got the Morning Glory muffins, Banana Chocolate Chip, Pumpkin Apple and a Chocolate Croissant.   All delicious.
I'd recommend.
Fresh and tasty
It was my first time eating there and it won't be my last. I had a vegan sandwich, but I'm not vegan or vegetarian and it was delicious! I tried a French toast cupcake, which was also very good.

I ordered from here today and it was soooooo good! I had the sausage, egg, provolone, with sundried tomatoes on the rosemary sourdough! I added the basil Mayo and it was delicious! My daughter had the bacon egg and cheese on the cheddar biscuit...Amazing! I will definitely try more from here. So good!

Loved their croissants, they had a seasonal foraging sandwich with mushrooms and cheese that I really liked , the key lime tart was pretty good but portion is too big , would be more happy with a smaller size , also the amount of filling was a little too much and pretty intense but I liked it

I've only ever gotten takeout from Uber eats but good job guys

Everything is always so yummy
Very friendly astomphere
My family always enjoys their tasty creations.  The breads are always perfect for the unique sandwiches offered.  I especially like #2 on Multigrain.  Reasonably priced for tasty quality.

I've been here 3 times for breakfast with my husband. Twice before covid and then today. Same disappointment each time. This morning ordered bacon egg and cheese on sourdough. sandwich given to me on a tray w no parchment/ protective sheet. My husbands croissant sandwich did have parchment on the tray. I find this very unsanitary. Bacon on both sandwiches was crumbles of burnt bacon that was not fresh. Husbands croissant over toasted as well. Sandwiches came out before can of coke and iced latte. Never brought my cookie out had to go to counter and ask. The one ketchup bottle in the restaurant was empty. Husband waited at the counter to ask for a new one, got ignored.  Overall restaurant service not good, food not good and WAY overpriced for what it is. I am a local so to have tried this place multiple times over the years and it's the same level of disappointment each time. I don't think it's hard to make a fresh breakfast sandwich and give someone their drink before their food. Or at least with their food. Won't be coming back.
2 stars only bc cookie and iced latte tasted good.

7th Street location is 10x better.

I started going to this one in Harrisburg because I live closer to it now, but I work near 7th street sometimes and still go there when I can.

Harrisburg is inferior to the 7th street location in every way.

No matter who makes my latte at the Harrisburg location, they never froth the milk. At the other location, I overheard the manager telling a new hire how important it is to get the foam right. And that standard is upheld by their staff every time I go in there.

They're much more friendly as well at the 7th street store. I don't need overly chipper or phony staff, but at least be polite. At Harrisburg they are kind of unwelcoming and cold.

Also, they have you waiting for no reason and pick and choose who to prioritize, and because they hate having to speak to you, they don't communicate anything.

I ordered a soy latte and a pastry while I was the only person inside. Right after I ordered and tipped, several people came in, and they were all taken care of while I stood there empty handed. I have my theories as to why i was disregarded and thrown on the backburner for those other customers. The guy who took my order kept looking at me then dashes to the back and took a long cake order over the phone. He asked me about 15 minutes later if i had gotten my drink yet when he could clearly see that i didn't have anything in my hands resembling a pastry bag or a coffee cup. So then he asked another employee to make my drink and she was clearly irritated by this request. She messed around for several minutes before picking up the cup he marked for me and begrudgingly making my drink. Of course after all that, she sat the drink next to the register without saying anything, and the milk in my latte was scorched and without foam. Shots tasted weak too. The Pastry was very good though.

I'm good on this particular location. It's trash. I'd rather just go 2 more minutes up the road to the Starbucks.
Great selection for breakfast and lunch. Quick service.

Usually on a sandwich everything is packed in the middle and you're left with empty bread bites but I got the club sandwich on rosemary bread and was pleasantly surprised to find there was not a bad bite  it was deliciously packed with flavor!

Food was very good. My SO and I both got their specialty breakfast sandwiches, the kitchen had to remake his but they were very quick and nice about it. Coffee was good, especially compared to the other local places we tried. Wait time was maybe 10-15 minutes, which I feel I fast for a small coffee shop as busy as it was.
This is a very nice place with a present vibe! Great people to be around, great food and worth every penny too. They're very vegan friendly
Favorite bakery in all of Charlotte or Harrisburg. Only place I'll go for pastries or cake bakery-ing! Their cakes are #2Die4!

Extremely overpriced, tasteless food. Would not recommend at all. Had an iced coffee - it was 90% milk. All bread was burnt - or stale.  Blueberry muffins were dry and old.  Spent $50 for 3 breakfast sandwiches, one coffee and 3 blueberry muffins.

Their pastries are amazing but every single time I go here there is always a problem with my order.  Missing food; wrong food; online ordering takes much longer than if I would have walked in; the latest time we waited 30 minutes for our order and they never even sent the ticket to the kitchen, the staff wasn't even apologetic.
I do not see myself going here again.
Service was great, but the coffee is terrible. I got an ice caramel latte and it was the worst coffee I've ever had. It looked good but certainly was not, catfished coffee.
Good cookies

My original review is still relevant however the past several times we've been (at least 3 times a month), management has been very harsh with their staff. We love to support our local businesses, but it's hard to actively come in and support management who degrade their staff.

Best coffee and croissants you'll find in the area. Atmosphere isn't the cosiest but I go back everytime just for the food. The staff can sometimes be somewhat aloof, but easily my favorite place to go and catch up with friends.
Ordered two peanut butter and jelly croissants.  Took half hour to get our food!  Great when we finally got it.

Waited an hour both times I've gone in for food. Once is a fluke, totally understandable, life happens. Twice in a row?  Asked after 30 minutes about my order both times I've been in and was told the printer in the kitchen didn't always work. Ok, so the counterfolk asked the kitchen workers directly to make the order. And 30 minutes later when they still didn't have it, they told me the same thing.

Watched someone else ask for a refund, in the meantime, because they couldn't wait any longer for their order. And then watched another customer who'd just received their food complain about having to wait 45 minutes for their sandwich. And then watched a little boy who was there with his mom go to the counter because he'd been waiting almost an hour for his food.

Asked for a refund for our order at the one hour mark, and suddenly had food in my hands five minutes later, because the front counter folk asked them (AGAIN) to make my order immediately. Two basic sandwiches and two coffees. We did get our coffees quickly when we initially ordered, to be fair. But that's all we'd ordered. Nothing complicated. Not a huge quantity. Nothing with customizations. Basic and simple. And the food was great, no doubt.

It was also wrong.  After all that waiting, they made me the wrong damn sandwhich. And since we'd said we couldn't wait around any longer, please wrap it up to go, I didn't find out til I was in the car Unfortunately, no way was I going back in for them to correct it; I'd never eat.

The amount of time it took to get my food for both visits was awful. It's clearly not just a once in a while, they're busy, sort of thing. They're slow, they're inattentive to the tickets they have in the window and how long those tickets have been in the window for, and they're not worth it.

Won't go here again and would advise not stopping in unless you have an hour or so to kill.

Waited almost 40 minutes for a latte and cappuccino. Lady next to me waited even longer for a hot tea. Fine for a quick pastry but if need a quick coffee definitely just skip and go to Starbucks. Disappointed with not only speed of service but attitudes. Girl at the register was great, not so much dining room attendants.
Great pastries

Their food is decent, I've tried better coffee and muffins. Their wait times are long, had to wait 20 mins for my iced latte I ordered and a muffin which was just sitting there waiting to be packed. There were only 2 other people in line. Overall, not bad though.

Used to be good a long time ago. Food is still good, except coffee tasted a bit bitter. Guess it's good for those that choose to stay and eat, but getting a sandwich to go that has strong scents, packaging with pickle, and then adding croissant and blueberry muffin to three same bag leaves not for a pleasant taste. Just watch for the way things are packaged and would not get the coffee again.

Rude customer service. Called to talk to the manager they said it was no manager at this location so how is the store running..... I also stood there for 15 mins until someone ask me what I needed. I wish I could give a 0.
Excellent coffee and bread. We love to sit outside when the weather is nice
Vegan dessert?  Well here's the place and also fresh pastries period
excellent Cinnamon  rolls.  Will check out lunch on July 26, 2022!
Delicious treats, great selection and phenomenal baking team!
Food is awsome and the business honors Veteran's discounts with 10% discounts.
I keep coming here hoping it will get better. It doesn't.  Its always a super long wait and the food has decreased in quality. Disappointing when precovid this place rocked.
Ultra mega slow. As other reviewers have stated staff is awkward and really doesn't Like certain types of people. Felt unwelcome..
Love their croissants and cookies. Will pass on everything else...

Treat day, had not been there in a while-my pennie was okay, just okay, however, I got home-the sweets were old and cold like they had been frozen and there was mold on my lemon cupcake. Our large rolls were hard and stale, not what we saw in the case. I do think we were sold old outdated goods, THAT THEY DID NOT WANT TO TOSS OUT. I am so sad about it, and spending over 50 dollars to treat my family was a heart break too. The keylime pie was a birthday gift for our son and it was old and the crust was soggy not fresh at all. We threw the entire bacth out and chalked it up as a never go back, how sad. Not sure what happened to Sunflour :( I hate giving bad reviews. just what happened to me...
How sad once worth the drive from one city to another just to get to Sunflour. Not anymore.
I'm been there last year and I like it thank you sunflower bakery I love it I wish I can come back again if my parents agree

This review is purely based on service. I have no idea who is running this place or managing but the service is horrendous here. It doesn't really matter if you order food (or coffee) that may be good if you don't get it until 1.5 hrs after you order. It's a let down regardless. Not to mention the impersonal and callus nature of the severs and hosts. Not the only review I've seen like this but apparently the management (and other patrons leaving 5 stars) don't seem to take it seriously enough to care to fix their issues.
Fresh food, good food and great service.
Omg the hummus on a cheddar biscuit is so delicious this will differently be my new spot

My girlfriend and I love the breakfast here! Only suggestion I would have, is they do not have any sugar free syrups for their coffee. Even a simple sugar free vanilla syrup would go a long way. We end up having to go to starbucks afterwards but would be nice for a one stop shop and we love to support local.

Absolutely great fit and a good location.
The place is always visited by regulars and the pastries are always fresh.
Although,last week i did have a little oily coffee head from the flavor shot.
Nonetheless it was still another good trip had.

I usually love this place, great food, great drinks, and amazing service. But today I got a cinnamon roll and there was a hair in it. This has never happened before so I'm not upset, but still want to bring awareness of the issue.

One of the easiest 5-star ratings, best apple pie I ever had. 

This the best bakery that i have tried in states so far, and thats by a mile. 

This is become my regular spot and always bring out town family and friends to tried out and the reaction is always the same, simply amazing 

Keep up the amazing the work
Service is good. I had the club sandwich and the cinnamon roll, they were great!
Awesome biscuits and bake goods. Great service and friendly.
THAT CINNAMON ROLL!!?
The Avocado, Egg, Cheddar on a Cheddar Biscuit is really good.
Sandwiches are fantastic! Muffins and pastries are great, too. You really can't go wrong with anything you get here
A darling local gem with hearty sandwiches and rich coffee. Do not miss it.
Great breakfast sandwiches and pastry is awesome. Locally owned!
My favorite breakfast/brunch spot! Haven't been disappointed on anything thus far.

The pumpkin muffin was great, and they had a gluten free option. Not many gluten free options though. No gluten free bread option for sandwiches, but they do have sourdough which is "less" gluten. The latte took quite a while, guess the coffee orders were really behind.

The food is excellent, but the staff is super awkward. I did not feel welcome here. Some of the employees are extremely impersonal. No greeting, no eye contact, no sense of normality. Thick air and bad vibes.

I won't begin to speculate as to why, however, after 4+ visits I am certain I'm not misinterpreting anything. Now I remember why I stopped bringing my family here in the first place, and why we won't be returning. Truly disappointing.
Great good and service.
All I can say is Yummmmm!!! I eat here pretty often and it's always great. The drinks are just as amazing!!! Just a FYI!!
Staff was great, food was delicious.
Great desserts
Food is so good! Great service! Such a great hidden gem.

Disgusted. Was going to get muffin & coffee. Muffin was 5.50. BS. Just got coffee. Was so sour and acidy. Put in 5 creams, 3 sugars which is way more than I usually do and still acid burned my throat and stomach and I've had some bad coffee in my life. Had to throw it away after a few small sips. Frikkin total waste of time and money.

They always have a wonderful variety of pastries, sweets, breads and lunch foods! I really appreciate that they make vegan gluten free goodies (for when my sister visits!) They taste wonderful you wouldn't even know they are vegan gluten free! The staff is helpful but make sure you walk up to the register (don't just stand in front of the case...) They won't come get your order.
Awesome coffee , Awesome food ( you can taste the love ) and Awesome staff , always number 1 all around .
Pretty good, love the BLTs but ask for the bread non-toasted, otherwise your childhood traumas of eating captain crunch will come back
Very watery coffee. Disappointing.
Nice coffee and good breakfast
Great place with delicious food. Much bigger inside than I anticipated,  lots of seating. Cinnamon roll was divine!
This place is a hidden gem I love it great avocado and cheese eggs
Fast service for delivery

Had the Sunny's Special breakfast sandwich - egg, sausage, sundried tomato pesto, and arugula.  It was awesome...probably one of the best sandwiches I have ever had.

I would have taken a picture, but I could not stop until it was gone!
Great food and a lovely atmosphere
Discovered this little gem and boy I'm glad I did!!! The breakfast sandwiches, house brew coffee, and bakery goods are ALL delicious!!!
Fun bakery and sandwich shop. Order ahead was a nice option but the location and interior have a nice atmosphere for eating in

Everything was eye catching and looked appetizing. I had the sunny special on a croissant and it was really good, but a bit too greasy. I was expecting the cupcakes to be more exciting, but the frosting tasted kind of waxy. It's really popular amongst locals and the prices are not too bad.

I love this place and they cater to Vegans. I order a Vegan 3 layer carrot cake every year. I go for the Vegan Banana Chocolate chip muffins, they are amazing. They also have breakfast and lunch options.
Absolutely delicious croissants and coffee.   highly recommended
Super delicious desserts!

My mothers coffee was stale / old. Horrible customer service, like whatever the kids behind the register were smoking, I DO NOT WANT ANY !! It was like a bad episode of clueless mixed with bevis and butthead. Back to the food. I asked for my croissants to be toasted,  they weren't. My sons food came out and he still was waiting for orange juice. My sons muffin was so hard, he couldn't chew it, it was tough to cut through. Not a great experience. My tea was ok
Gluten free options and mocha latte better than Starbucks! Gives little Harrisburg a big city feel!

Lots of great vegan options for us (gluten-free options as well. Great selection of baked goods, fresh and warm at 7 a.m. Plus breakfast and lunch options. Sandwiches, panini and more - the spicy hummus sandwich on rosemary bread is vegan and amazing.

Great little bakery, very clean inside. Food / pastries / coffee are great. Good place to meet up to chat with friends or study. Pro tip:  if you are in a hurry and getting something to go definitely call ahead or order online as they make everything fresh so its easily a 15-20 minute wait.

Food, coffee, and customer service is great. Sometimes hot foods may take some time to be made so I'll call ahead for pickup.
Depends on the time of day, parking can be tight.
Vanilla cake with caramel filling and a chocolate drip. Delicious

I ordered three sandwiches on Sunday.  Each one was delicious and well packaged.  This was my first time ordering from this place and I will now continue to patronize Sunflour Baking Co. Service and delivery was excellent!

Such a nice little bakery here in town. The service was very good, very knowledgeable associates. The food did take a little longer than expected, and the cupcake was half the price of my sandwich; which was no big deal. The sandwich, which I got the BLT, was very good and the chocolate gluten free cupcake was very good indeed. Support your local businesses!
Lots of vegan options and gluten free options.  Really tasty
A quiet spot to get some work done a fresh baked goods, coffee and sandwiches

The bakery is great! But the baristas are not experienced. I asked for a cortado and did not receive the right drink, I asked for it to be remade and they gave me the same thing again. If you're getting coffee  stick to the basics.

Amazing Amazing Amazing. So fresh. Best croissants and egg sandwiches hands down. I've also tried the tuna melt and it is amazing. Will take pictures next time. Will definitely be returning to this one. This will be my got to breakfast place hands down. The person at the register does need to check on orders more though. My order was ready and waiting and I had to ask her to check on it after noticing for several minutes it was just ready and sitting there.
Wonderful selection.  Great customer service.

EDIT, "last 2 visits Harrisburg' location were awful, I may be done trying and it's a shame that it went downhill like this .  Needs better quality control and management."

I so wanted this to be great and if I rated on the taste only it is. Unfortunately I am now pretty sure that key lime filling should be refrigerated and the tart filled with it was not. I was sick after eating here and I'm blaming it on the tart, although it is possible it was something else I had there. I have been back and upgraded my rating. I love this place and just knocked off one star for the tart.

Went in for brunch and honestly. It's a nice place, ample parking space, clean, covid mandates followed and all the good stuff. Rr could use a regular-ish kinda cleaning but it's kept well. I ordered the tomato provolone egg sandwich and their specialty iced coffee (in pic) and he ordered the breakfast special which basically everything. The coffee was a bit different for my taste but tastes good. There is something missing tho and we can't pin point exactly what. Oh also ordered the cheddar biscuit and that was good too. Worth a try definately. Would I go back? Maybe yes..
Good food, non-engaging staff, long wait for the food and drip coffee refills are still charged at half price.  Too many better places to return here.

Wish I had a better review but as of May 2021, the service was extremely slow on a Saturday morning. It took my friend and I 40 mins to get a latte, tea, and 2 muffins. Hate to say it but don't come if you're in a rush. Seems to be quite understaffed, but maybe it was just that day

I usually don't do reviews but I do love Sunflour and it's actually nice to have something like this in Harrisburg.   But unfortunately whoever is running it needs to improve the service. I have never been to the store and not wait for at least 15-20 minutes. Even when you call ahead you are still waiting on line. I placed my order at 10:13AM, got there at 10:25, finally got  my coffee at 10:55. Now my coffee is cold!! This isn't the first time getting my coffee cold or my bake goods not as I ordered either.
What is the purpose of calling ahead if it's the same wait time?  Here's an idea create another line just for pick up just like all the other restaurants.
delicious sandwiches and bakery.

My Vegan daughter and non-vegan family usually struggle to find a place to make us all happy. This is one of the few places that cover both. Add to it Sunflour's smiling and helpful staff and we have a winner whenever in town to visit family.
This was my first time ordering from here. I got the avocado melt & my avocado was black. I don't know why you would give someone that.

Only tried one cupcake thus far... triple chocolate.  So good.  Very rich.  Might wanna share.  I went at 330pm and the glass was a little sparse since they closed at 4, but still a good selection.   Will update once I try my other goods. My wife and I plan to return.  We want to try all the flavors, especially the seasonal flavors.

I went there today to pick up two orders that were ordered previously supposed to be ready. I was in the bakery for 40 minutes waiting for these two simple orders to be made. The high school workers that they have working there are incapable of running a busy bakery.
Love this place. Very cute little bakery with good sandwiches.

The only reason I gave this place 4 stars instead of 5 is because they didn't have the Turkey Reuben when I was in there today, which I've always wanted to try. Shame!! I was so disappointed, because I live a little ways away and don't get into Harrisburg often, and it's only seasonal. I've passed by this place for years, (even when it was under different management) and I've always looked over in a kid-like curiosity like, "One day..." Today was the day!!! Egg, spinach, tomato, provolone and turkey on and a cheese biscuit! I am not really the one for egg sandwiches, or writing reviews, but this one was a MUST! This sandwich is a must!!! I personally wouldn't do it without turkey, but to each his own, just ENJOY! This sandwich was not seasonal, so I will be back! And I absolutely love and adore the "Sunflower" decor!
Very brown nasty lettuce on the sandwiches.

This place was DISGUSTING! I was so disappointed (bc the good reviews and how cute the inside was) WRONG!!!! My sandwich had a hair in it && they had awful customer service. Never going to that place again!

What a cute little bakery! Breakfast options! Lunch options! Cookies, muffins, scones! Coffee coffee coffee! Lattes! Chai! And plenty of seating for dining in. Bar space available for folks wanting to work on their laptop while watching the world go by outside. This seems to be the best place for breakfast and lunch in Harrisburg! Highly recommended for kids, families, and solo adventures! Enjoy your time!
I loved the place and ambiance. Breakfast is also tasty. Best place for good start in the morning.
My daughter bought us s box of croissants and we had to go check this place out. We loved it. And bought a box to go keep up the good work!

Fabulous bakery and dining spot for breakfast and lunch. The pastries and confections they bake on site will satisfy any sweet tooth. Breakfast options will make your mouth water as the enormous croissant breakfast sandwiches are just about enough to share. I highly recommend the cheddar biscuit to house your breakfast sandwich. Very moist and yummy. Will go back soon and try their lunch menu.
Love the food here, fresh and delicious

Wonderful baked goods. Enjoyed my time on the dining room with a buddy over a sour dough sandwich with bacon egg and cheddar. Picked up sour dough English muffins and a couple a other muffins to go. Will most certainly go back but please stock cans of Coke zero for us non coffee drinkers.
Lovely place. Delicious healthy options. Highly recommend!

Met a friend for a socially distant visit just before lunch. They got very busy and handled all customers with ease. I got an iced tea and ginger cookie. The tea was EXCELLENT! The ginger cookie was really good too, made with real ginger. Absolutely going back.
Update:  Went back and experienced similar long wait time with very few customers.   The one young lady behind the counter was not pleasant. She wasn't mean, just no 'you're welcome, hello, etc. Now that I've read other reviews from this and the other locations,  I see this is the norm. Great food, a plethora of tasty drink and food choices, but not so welcoming staff and poorly managed.  Food service has to be managed well or no matter how good the food is, it will eventually fail. Food must be ordered so you can replenish before running out, online orders that include items not available  should be paused so the customer can be contacted.   Most importantly,  hire enough qualified staff for each shift. I will be going back and hoping for a better customer service experience.  Now after all of these reviews with the same complaint, let's see if the owner cares enough to address it and change.
Delicious baked goods. Will try breakfast or lunch sandwiches on my next trip.
Walked in for a Doordash and this place just looks amazing. presentation is their bread and butter, will definitely come back and check them out (:
Loved this coffee shop!! Super cute and good affordable prices!

Absolutely love this bakery! Very friendly staff, decent coffee/tea selections, diverse variety of food for breakfast/brunch, and there are even options for people with food allergies which is always a plus. We enjoy every visit!
Weak and like warm Chai. Breads in sandwiches is too salty.
Great bakery type place!

This place was absolutely delicious absolutely a must go to if you're in the area. I happen to be in the area for business purposes but when I saw this place I decided to check it out and it had the best selection of food and desserts and I'm not going to lie if my wife finds out she'd be very mad at all the dessert I got lol.
Wait time was 40 minutes for one sandwich
The cheddar biscuit was absolutely incredible! Would definitely come back again just for that. The staff were friendly and the coffee was good too!

Great food and drinks, took a little long for the drinks to come out, but they were good, fresh and tasty. Would recommend and will return. Would suggest a savory croissant, and the cheesecakes are fantastic.
Tasty food; pleasant servers.
Great food for the price
Great English muffins

Excellent quality. Nice variety, super pleasant staff. Very clean. One of the really good scratch bakeries around. For the cold weather, I would recommend their soups which change regularly. Super flavorful and all made from fresh ingredients..
Their chocolate banana muffin is my favorite!

Normally, they are middle of the road in service. Today, however, was appalling. Called in at 915am for a simple tuna melt sandwich for pickup. Get to shop and paid at 927am. Sat and watched countless Togo orders leave before mine. Even more upsetting saw 4 sandwich orders that was placed in house long after I paid, get made and served before I received my order. Didn't leave with my order until 945am. Not sure how they prioritize the sequence of making orders but it definitely needs to be revisited. To put the cherry on top, made it to work 5mins after leaving only to realize they probably left my sandwich in the toaster the whole time I was waiting. Def not enjoying this burnt toast smh.
